alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 3:22PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central El Paso County through 345 PM MDT... At 322 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Falcon, or 12 miles east of Colorado Springs, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eastern Colorado Springs, Schriever AFB and Cimarron Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
